name: Cut The Cheese SIMULATOR
description:
You work in a government cheese factory turning it into something almost edible.

Cut the cheese into the requested shape, drill holes when necessary, blast it with one of several delicious flavors such as "orange" and "blue", and finally throw it in a box with a country flag on it to disguise the cheese's true origins.

Occasionally some cheese are too rank even for the government, and when that's the case it's your job to dispose of them before they make it to the end of the production line.

Work quickly, work accurate to the specifications, and survive another day in your dead end job as a government cheese factory worker. 

At least you can listen to your radio while you work.

Hooray!

Gameplay:

Check your PDA for the specifications required for the cheese you are currently looking at.

Place the cheeses into the machines and operate the machines so that each cheese achieves its specified state. 

The setting buttons are on the left, the red and green buttons on the right operate and emergency eject the cheese respectively.

Stinky cheese should be discarded in one of the red incinerators marked with the hazard stripes.

You can stop the conveyor belt 3 times per day using the red button at the start of the conveyer belt. Use this as an opportunity to regain your wits if you become overwhelmed with cheese.

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Mouse Click to pick up cheese, place cheese on machine, and operate machine buttons.

Hold Spacebar to view your PDA displaying the requested specifications for the cheese you are currently looking at.
